thread.title: adidas Is Releasing the Ultra Boost 3.0 In a Murky “Black Silver” Colorway
thread.title_full: adidas Is Releasing the Ultra Boost 3.0 In a Murky “Black Silver” Colorway

author: Daniel Pearson
title: adidas Is Releasing the Ultra Boost 3.0 In a Murky “Black Silver” Colorway
text:
Visit the original post to see all 5 images from this gallery. 
adidas is gearing up to release the Ultra Boost 3.0 in yet another mainly black colorway, this time in a murky “Black Silver.”
Unlike its “ Triple Black ” predecessor, this Ultra Boost 3.0 boasts contrasting silver patterns all across the standard Primeknit upper. The lockdown cage comes in a semi-translucent greenish grey, and the Boost-cushioned sole in a deep black.
Overall, it’s another top addition to the 3.0 lineup and another opportunity for those of us who missed out on previous drops to pick up similarly gloomy-colored kicks.
The Three Stripes is slated to release the Ultra Boost 3.0 “Black Silver” as part of its Spring 2017 collection. Stay tuned for more information.
In other sneaker news, Reebok’s Instapump Fury arrives in “Hunter Green.”
